info: To create one, choose the 'Mihile' option in the Character Creation screen. Mihiles have their own separate creation button. As well, they have a different story than regular Cygnus Knights but are part of the same class group

build: -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Radiant Cross - Reinforce, Guardbreak, and Extra Strike
  • Install Shield - Reinforce
  • Royal Guard - Guardbreak

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
*
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • The last skill from the Secondary Trio can be any skill as Mihile only has 5 skills to boost
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

credits: Boost Nodes Build + Hyper Passive Build + Inner Ability

extraContent.title: Radiant Soul Skills
extraContent.content:
Several of Mihile's attacks are labelled as 'Radiant Soul' skills which have an interaction with the 3rd Job skill Offensive Defense that applies a debuff to enemies hit by Royal Guard counterattack. Radiant Soul skills will consume the debuff and deal a shockwave attack. Below is a list of all Mihile's Radiant Soul skills:

  • Shining Pierce - 1st Job
  • Four-Point Assault - 2nd Job
  • Soul Release - 3rd Job
  • Radiant Cross - 4th Job
  • Charging Light - Hyper Skill
  • Sword of Light - 5th Job
  • Radiant Soul - 5th Job

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Imperial Recall
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, return to Ereve immediately.\nCooldown: 600 sec.

primary.name: Noble Mind
primary.shortDesc: Increases Empress's Blessing max level by 6
details: This skill is leveled up by completing quests from Neinheart after Lv. 125

primary.name: Elemental Expert
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power and Magic ATT: +10%

primary.name: Knight's Watch
primary.shortDesc: Barrier Duration: 45 sec, Enemy Blows Blocked: 9, Damage: +25%. Damage -30% only for attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio of the Max HP\nCooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: Increases %Damage and creates a barrier that blocks a fixed number of attacks
details: For %Max HP attacks, reduces the amount of damage taken

Can be found in the Link Manager
  • Skill is only applicable to Mihile, when linked, characters receive an Abnormal Status Resistance buff instead

primary.name: Empress's Shout
primary.shortDesc: Max HP and Max MP: +20%
details: Gained from completing the quest 'The Gift for the Empress' at Lv. 100

primary.name: Empress's Prayer
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 2 hours
details: Gained from completing the quest 'The Gift for the Empress' at Lv. 100
Affects all nearby players and effect remains active even after KO
Has a cooldown (1 day), unaffected by cooldown resets and buff duration increase

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: + 4%, Duration: 40 min
details: Gained from completing the quest <a href='https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/13/Will_of_Light' target='_blank' rel='noreferrer noopener'>'Will of Light'<a/> at Lv. 200
Cannot be applied while is active
Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Shining Pierce
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 190%, Number of Attacks: 2\nBlind Chance: 15%, Blind Duration: 10 sec, Accuracy: -30%
primary.desc: Strike fowards with a chance to apply Blind debuff
details: [Blind]: Reduces enemy %Accuracy

primary.name: Royal Guard
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 20, become invincible when attacked for 4 sec, nullifying attacks and counterattacking for a set time after use. Attack Power increases for 20 sec per counterattack.
If you guard successfully while in Attack Power Increase buff state, counterattack damage, attack range, and Attack Power increases gradually.
[1st Time]: Max Number of Enemies: 6, Damage: 305%, Number of Attacks: 4, Attack Power: +10.
[2nd Time]: Max Number of Enemies: 7, Damage: 370%, Number of Attacks: 5, Attack Power: +15.
[3rd Time]: Max Number of Enemies: 8, Damage: 470%, Number of Attacks: 6, Attack Power: +20.
Cooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: Briefly enter a stance where if you are hit, the attack is nullified and you become invincible and release a counterattack
details: Counterattack releases a shockwave that becomes stronger and larger for each successful counterattack (up to 3 stacks)
Successful counterattacks will also grant a flat Attack buff that grows stronger for each successful counterattack (up to 3 stacks)
Can be used while casting another skill
Ignores Damage Ignore and Damage Reflect

primary.name: Weightless Heart
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, allows you to jump a greater distance
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Soul Shield
primary.shortDesc: DEF: +200, Max HP: +20%, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Soul Devotion
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +25, Jump +20, Max Speed: +10

primary.name: Righteous Indignation
primary.shortDesc: When attacking enemies with Blind, Final Damage: +10%, Critical Rate: +10%

primary.name: Four-Point Assault
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 18, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 145%, Number of Attacks: 6\nBlind Chance: 20%, Blind Duration: 10 sec, Accuracy: -30%
primary.desc: Strike forward with multiple swords with a chance to apply Blind debuff
details: [Blind]: Reduces enemy %Accuracy

primary.name: Radiant Driver
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 400% while moving
primary.desc: Dashes forward while pushing enemies back

primary.name: Vertical Radiant Driver
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 400% while moving
primary.desc: Charges upwards while pushing enemies back
details: Can also be activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Skill Key together
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) with

primary.name: Encourage
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Duration: 180 sec, Attack Power: +30\n[Passive Effects: Royal Guard Lv. 1 - 3 Counterattack Damage: +70% points]
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of counterattack (1 - 3 stacks) by a flat amount

primary.name: Agile Swords
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, STR: +20

primary.name: Sword Mastery
primary.shortDesc: One-Handed Sword Mastery: +50%, Attack Power: +20, Final Damage: +15%

primary.name: Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Has a 40% chance to deal 50% Final Attack damage 3 time(s).
primary.desc: Grants your attacks a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Soul Release
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 19, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 460%, Number of Attacks: 3\nBlind Chance: 30%, Blind Duration: 10 sec, Accuracy: -30%
primary.desc: Releases a blast of light forward with a chance to apply Blind debuff
details: [Blind]: Reduces enemy %Accuracy

primary.name: Magic Crash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, 100% chance to remove enemies' buffs. For 22 sec, prevents 10 enemies from casting buffs.\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Removes buffs on nearby enemies and prevents them from casting new buffs
details: Enemies affected by Magic Crash cannot be affected again for a short period
Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Soul Link
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost per sec: 15
[Mihile]: Damage: +5% per party member in the same map. If you are not in a party, you will be considered to be in a 1-person party.
[Party Member]: When Mihile succeeds with Royal Guard, creates a protective shield that is 10% of each party member's Max HP for 10.0 sec for party members in the Soul Link's range.
Periodically for 8 sec, party members in the Soul Link's range receive a bonus to Attack and MAGIC ATT equal to 50% of the Attack Power bonus from Royal Guard. If Advanced Royal Guard is active, they will receive 20% of its Status Resistance and 30% of its DEF Bonus.
primary.desc: While active, increases your %Damage for every party member within range
details: If you are not in a party, you will be considered a 1-person party
[Party Member]: Upon successful counterattacks, party members gain a shield based on a percentage of their Max HP
[Party Member]: Periodically party members within range will receive an Attack/Magic Attack buff equal to 50% of the Attack buff from and 20% of Status Resistance and 30% of %DEF from

primary.name: Advanced Royal Guard
primary.shortDesc: [4th Time]: Max Number of Enemies: 10, Damage: 580%, Number of Attacks: 7, Attack Power: +30.\n[5th Time]: Max Number of Enemies: 15, Damage: 665%, Number of Attacks: 9, Attack Power: +45\n[Passive Effect - Defense: +100%, Status Resistance: +60, Elemental Resistance: +60%]
details: Increases max stacks to 5
Now also permanently increases %DEF and Abnormal Status Resistance

primary.name: Self Recovery
primary.shortDesc: Restores 4% of Max HP and 4% of Max MP every 4 sec.

primary.name: Loyal Oath
primary.shortDesc: Strength: +60, Critical Rate: +20%, Final Damage: +25%, Attack Speed: +1

primary.name: Advanced Righteous Indignation
primary.shortDesc: When attacking enemies with Blind, Stun, Offensive Defense debuff, or Charging Light debuff, Final Damage: +15%, Critical Rate: +10%\nAdditive with effect that increases with Righteous Indignation
details: Increases effects to also apply to attacking enemies with Blind, Stun, debuff, or debuff
Increases %Final Damage and %Crit Rate provided (additively)

primary.name: Offensive Defense
primary.shortDesc:
When Royal Guard's counterattack hits, give enemy Offensive Defense debuff for 20 sec
When Radiant Soul skill hits enemy with the debuff, a light shockwave is created centered on the enemy that was hit. The Offensive Defense debuff disappears when the enemy is hit by the light shockwave.
Light Shockwave - Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 350%, Number of Attacks: 5
Cooldown: 12 sec
primary.desc: Enemies hit by counterattack receive an 'Offensive Defense' debuff
details: [Offensive Defense]: Radiant Soul skills consume the debuff to deal a shockwave attack to nearby enemies
Shockwave will be centered on the boss with the highest Max HP or the closest enemy among those hit if there are no bosses nearby

primary.name: Call of Cygnus
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Cygnus Knights' Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Radiant Cross
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 530%, Number of Attacks: 4
Blind Chance: 30%, Blind Duration: 10 sec, Accuracy: -30%
------Radiant Cross - Assault------
MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 326%, Number of Attacks: 10
Blind Chance: 30%, Blind Duration: 10 sec, Accuracy: -30%
primary.desc: Slash forward creating a small shockwave with a chance to apply Blind debuff
details: [Blind]: Reduces enemy %Accuracy
While is active, this skill is enhanced to Radiant Cross - Assault, the 2nd animation

primary.name: Roiling Soul
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Final Damage: +25%, Critical Damage: +10%\nRadiant Soul Skill Blind Chance: +100%\nReduces the Max Enemies Hit for all skills (except some summons) by 1/3. For skills that target multiple enemies, Max Enemies Hit won't be reduced below 2.
primary.desc: While toggled, increases %Final Damage and %Crit Damage but reduces max enemies hit for all skills (except some summons) by 1/3
details: While active, all Radiant Soul skills have a guaranteed chance to apply Blind debuff

primary.name: Install Shield
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80, Duration: 60 sec
Periodically deals 225% damage 4 times to up to 6 enemies.
Damage Against Normal Enemies: +60%
Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Places a stationary shield that damages nearby enemies
details: Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Advanced Offensive Defense
primary.shortDesc: Offensive Defense Light Shockwave Damage: +250% points\nLight Shockwave cooldown decreases to 10 sec\nRoyal Guard Counterattack Damage at All Levels: +200% points
details: Increases the %Damage of shockwave and counterattack (all stacks) by a flat amount
Reduces cooldown of shockwave

primary.name: Soul Asylum
primary.shortDesc: When Royal Guard is successful, Damage -5% only for attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio to max HP for 15 sec\nDamage -10% permanently, Max HP: +20%
primary.desc: When is successful, gain a %Damage Reduction buff against %Max HP attacks
details: Additionally, permanently increases %Damage Reduction and %Max HP

primary.name: Expert Sword Mastery
primary.shortDesc: One-Handed Sword Mastery: +70%\nAttack Power: +30, Critical Rate: 15%, Critical Damage: +20%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage

primary.name: Advanced Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30 permanently.\n[Final Attack Skills] Final Attack Chance: 75%, Damage: 95%, Times Activated: 4.
details: Increases activation chance and %Damage
Now grants flat Attack

primary.name: Combat Mastery
primary.shortDesc: 40% enemy DEF ignored

primary.name: Power Stance
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance: +60%

hyperPassive.name: Royal Guard - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Decrease the potentcy of attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio to Max HP by an additional 5%, additive with Soul Asylum's effect

hyperPassive.name: Royal Guard - Persist
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Increases the damage reduction effect duration of attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio to Max HP by 5 sec

hyperActive.name: Soul Majesty
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 200, Duration: 25 sec, Damage: +15%
When Soul Asylum's Royal Guard succeeds while active, damage reduction of the damage reduction effect increases by 5%. The increased damage reduction is additive with Soul Asylum's effect.
Offensive Defense debuff occurs due to the active Install Shield. Cooldown of Offensive Defense Light Shockwave decreases to 2 sec
When Offensive Defense's Light Shockwave occurs, Light Wave occurs as well
Light Wave - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks; 6
Cooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: While active, increases %Damage and the %Damage Reduction provided from
details: During this time, the shockwave will also trigger an additional wave attack and can apply the debuff

hyperActive.name: Charging Light
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, Number of Enemies: 15, Damage: 825%, Number of Attacks: 10
10% more damage for party members including yourself for 60 sec
Blind Chance: 50%, Blind Duration: 10 sec, Accuracy: -30%
Cooldown: 15 sec
hyperActive.desc: Strike forward damaging and applying a debuff to enemies with a chance to apply Blind debuff
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Damage from all party members
[Blind]: Reduces enemy %Accuracy

hyperActive.name: Queen of Tomorrow
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nOnly Cygnus Knights and Mihile in the party receive the effect\nCooldown: 120 sec

fifthMain.name: Shield of Light
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 89 sec, Final Damage: +30%
Damage Reduction (to you and party members inside shield): 80% (including Percentage HP attacks) for 25 sec, blocks debilitating status conditions
Upon successful blocking of the attack and status conditions, the shield has 3 layers, which can defend against 9, 9, and 14 attacks, respectively. Number of blocks decrease only once both status condition and attack are applied at the same time.
Cooldow: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, increases your %Final Damage and creates a shield that defends party members against attacks and Critical Abnormal Statuses, reducing the amount of damage dealt (including %Max HP attacks)
details: The shield has 3 layers that can block 10/10/15 attacks/status each at Master Level 30
When an attack and status is applied at the same time, the shield is only decreased by 1

fifthMain.name: Sword of Light
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 800, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Attacks: 7
Damage increases based on Royal Guard's Attack Power buff's stack.
[3 Stacks or Lower] - Damage: 1450%
[4 Stacks] - Damage: 1650%
[5 Stacks] - Damage: 2000%
100% chance to Blind enemies for 10 sec, reducing their Accuracy by 30%
After use, Royal Guard's Attack Power Buff Duration: +6 sec, cannot exceed max stacks
Cooldown: 12 sec
fifthMain.desc: Shines a ray of light that damages and applies Blind debuff to nearby enemies
details: [Blind]: Reduces enemy %Accuracy
The size and damage of the attack becomes stronger based on how stacks of are active
Additionally, when Sword of Light is used, the duration of the Attack buff from is increased but cannot exceed the max duration
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Radiant Soul
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200
Equip a Sword of Light for 35 sec., empowering your attacks. Attack Power: +27%, Critical Rate: +100%, and Ignore Defense: +100%. Increases the duration of Royal Guard to a total of 0.5 sec.
While active, the afterimage of the sword periodically falls upon to 4 enemies, attacking 5 times for 900% damage.
Radiant Soul Slash: [Radiant Soul Skill] MP Cost: 100, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 880%, Number of Attacks: 12
Light Force Rei: [Radiant Soul Skill] Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1870%, Number of Light Attacks: 12, Number of Light Attack Occurances: 6.
When Radiant Soul Slash and Light Force Rei hits, 50% chance to Blind for 10 sec and decrease Accuracy by 30%
Cooldown: 180 sec.
fifthMain.desc: While active, increases %Attack, %Crit Rate, and %Ignore Defense and pressing the Attack Key performs a forward slash attack
details:
While active, pressing the Skill Key releases a blast of light attack one time per buff
  • Both attacks are 'Radiant Soul' skills
During this time, nearby enemies are periodically damaged and the activation period of is increased to 0.5 secs
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a function ON/OFF while Radiant Soul is active to perform the slash attack using either the Attack Key or
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Light of Courage
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 25 sec, Damage: +22%.\nParty Effect: Forms a protective shield that corresponds to 265% of your party's cumulative max HP. Protective Shield Duration: 12 sec., 7% of maxmium reduced every sec.\nCooldown: 90 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Increases your  %Damage and forms a protective shield to party members
details: [Party Effect]: Creates a decaying damage shield for each party member equal to a percentage of their Max HP

masteryCore.name: HEXA Radiant Cross
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 85, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 855%, Number of Attacks: 4
Blind Chance: 30%, Blind Duration: 10 sec, Accuracy: -30%
------Radiant Cross - Assault------
MP Cost: 85, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 530%, Number of Attacks: 10
Blind Chance: 30%, Blind Duration: 10 sec, Accuracy: -30%

originSkill.name: Durendal
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Powerfully stab the sword of light, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1500%, Number of Attacks: 7, Chase Cuts: 6
Then light energy is released, Damage: 1350%, Number of Attacks: 6, Earth Waves: 30
Lastly, Damage: 1375%, Number of Attacks: 14, Final Blows: 24
Blind Chance: 100%, Blind Duration: 10 sec, Accuracy: -30%
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Mihile is a STR warrior class part of the Cygnus Knights. What makes Mihile unique is their special ability to parry enemy attacks to create a powerful damaging shockwave that also grants a powerful attack buff
